title: 作者页工具 - 合著块
content:
[[module css]]

.collab-header{
 display:initial;
}

.written_by.\{\$written_by\} {display: none;}

.collabnote.\{\$note\} {display: none;}

[[/module]]

[[iftags +样版]]
此为懒人作者页所使用的辅助页面。它的使用方法与效果，[[[author-page-tool-guide#toc1|请参见此处。]]]
[[/iftags]]

[[module Listpages fullname="{$name}" category="*"]]
[[div class="au-preview {$background}"]]
**%%title_linked%%**
 +**{{%%rating%%}}**@@   @@^^...^^ **{{%%comments%%}}**
[[span class="written_by {$written_by}"]]//作者：// {$written_by}；[[/span]][[span class="collabnote {$note}"]]{$note}[[/span]]
//最新评论：// **{{%%commented_by%%}}** //于// **{{%%commented_at|%D %H:%M%%}}**
//最新编辑：// **{{%%updated_by%%}}** //于// **{{%%updated_at|%D %H:%M%%}}**
[[div class="span"]]
[[image :first class="imagepre {$image}"]]
%%preview%%
##000000|//标签：//## %%tags%%
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
author: W Asriel
